content:
TERM: Collaborative Design

DEFINITION:
Collaborative Design: designed to enable humans and AI to co-create new products, services, and experiences:

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
SPR extracted from agi.txt Node ?, type: capitalized_concept. Original SPR name: 'Collaborative Design'

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
epts.
    * Prototyping and Testing: Creating prototyping and testing techniques that enable the AI system to quickly and effectively test new ideas and concepts.

42. Human-AI Co-Creation: Mastermind_AI is designed to enable humans and AI to co-create new products, services, and experiences:
    * Collaborative Design: Developing collaborative design techniques that enable humans and AI to work together to design new products and services.
    * Co-Creation Tools: Implementing co-creation tools
